text:
"Becoming queen made her more confident." [redacted_name] says while slightly smiling.
"So would you like the come and punch me right now?" [redacted_name] asks her. Their a silence for a minute as[redacted_name] and [redacted_name] just look at each other.
"No Sir!" [redacted_name] exclaims as she looks away.
"Wow treat your queen better [redacted_name]." [redacted_name] jokes as she nudges him.
"Did that hurt? Well I'm queen now, so too bad!" [redacted_name] says as she backs up. "If you have a probl-" suddenly she stops as she hears a chuckle come from [redacted_name]. They all gasp and look up in surprised.
"Thank. you guys. I needed that." [redacted_name] tells them as he smiles.
Their silence as everyone jaw hits the floor.
"Is the screen broken?" [redacted_name] questions.
"He smiled?" [redacted_name] says in shock.
"This doesn't feel normal." [redacted_name] states.
"I didn't even know that was possible." [redacted_name] says.
"[redacted_name] you should smile more!" Hange says as she shakes him.
"Stop it four eyes. I was definitely not expect that to be my reaction." [redacted_name] says surprised by his actions. I mustt've grown close to them. He thinks.
trans:
"Diventare regina l'ha resa più sicura di sé." afferma [redacted_name] con un lieve sorriso.
"Quindi vorresti venire qui a darmi un pugno adesso?" le chiede [redacted_name]. Rimangono in silenzio per un minuto mentre [redacted_name] e [redacted_name] si guardano senza fare altro.
"No signore!" esclama [redacted_name] distogliendo  lo sguardo.
"Wow, tratta meglio la tua regina [redacted_name]." [redacted_name] scherza mentre gli dà una spintarella.
"Ti ha fatto male? Beh, adesso sono la regina, quindi peccato!" dice [redacted_name] mentre indietreggia. "Se hai un probl-" si ferma all'imporvviso sentendo una risatina provenire da [nome_redatto]. Tutti hanno un sussulto e alzano lo sguardo sorpresi.
"Grazie ragazzi. Ne avevo bisogno." si rivolge a loro [redacted_name] sorridendo.
Rimangono in silenzio spalancando la bocca.
"Si è rotto lo schermo?" Chiede [redacted_name]
"Ha sorriso?" Domanda [redacted_name] sconcertato.
"Non mi sembra normale." Afferma  [redacted_name].
"Non pensavo nemmeno che fosse possibile." dice [nome_redatto].
"[redacted_name], dovresti sorridere di più!" dice Hange scuotendolo.
"Piantala quattr'occhi. Sicuramente non mi aspettavo di reagire così." [redacted_name] afferma sorpreso dalle sue stesse azioni. Devo essermi avvicinato a loro. Pensa.
